summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Speed Alert Map App with trip history logging. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with minor GPS-related limitations.

ui_bugs.issue: Recording indicator not visible when GPS position unavailable
ui_bugs.details: Start recording button works but recording indicator and stop button don't appear without GPS position

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks interaction with settings button
ui_bugs.details: Overlay div intercepts pointer events preventing settings panel access

integration_issues.issue: Recording flow requires GPS position to function properly
integration_issues.details: Demo mode activation blocked by modal overlay, preventing GPS-less testing

passed_tests: Speed limit API with valid location
Trip list display with existing trips

priority_fixes: Fix modal overlay blocking settings panel interaction - add proper z-index management or click-through handling
Improve trip recording UX when GPS unavailable - show appropriate messaging or allow demo mode activation without GPS
optional_improvements: Add fallback UI state for recording when GPS position is unavailable
Consider adding keyboard shortcuts for demo mode activation
